Package controllers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InitialisableWithParameters
    Allows a FXML Controller Class to be initialised with arguments
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExitDialogController
    Allows the user the option of exiting the game or exiting and saving the game
    FindMessage
    Opens the cswebcat website, decodes and outputs the message.
    GameboardController
    Controls the Gameboard, the game's progression and its associated GUI
    LoadGameController
    Controls and handles the LoadGame scene
    MainMenuController
    Controls the Main Menu Scene
    MoveTileDialogController
    Display a dialog that allows the user to add their tile to the gameboard.
    ScoreboardController
    Controls the Scoreboard scene
    SelectTileDialogController
    Controller class for the Select Tile Dialog.
    SetUpGameController
    Controls the window that allows the user to set up a new game
    StageController
    Controls all operations on the Stage
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MoveTileDialogController.Axis
    Creates a type called Axis to be used to identify the axis of the selected linear array of tiles
